meanings.definition: A person affected with presbyopia, a condition of the eye in which the lens loses elasticity, making it difficult to focus on close objects.
meanings.sent1: The presbyope struggled to read the fine print on the medicine bottle.
meanings.sent2: My grandfather, a presbyope, always carries his reading glasses with him.
meanings.sent3: The presbyope tried to read the menu but ended up ordering something completely different.
meanings.sent4: As a presbyope, she felt like the world had suddenly become a blurry painting.
meanings.sent5: The presbyope's vision turned into a puzzle of fuzzy shapes and letters.
